tutorial.title: Welcome to Funnel!
content:
### A fun and interactive way to learn the basics of programming

Variables are used to store data. Here is how you can declare a variable:

```javascript
let x = 5;
```

You can then use this variable in your code. Here's a sample markdown list:

- Item 1
- Item 2
- Item 3

Click on the button marked `Variable` to reveal the available data types.

tutorial.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to Variables
content:
### Variables in JavaScript

Variables are used to store data. Here is how you can declare a variable:

```javascript
let x = 5;
```

Click on the button marked `Variable` to reveal the available data types.

You can then use this variable in your code.

### Data Types in JavaScript

JavaScript has several data types, including:

- Number
- String
- Boolean
- Object
- Array
- Function

You can use these data types to store different kinds of data.
